name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Oulu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: hotel lobby reeked of suspiciously dirty/old carpet. then again this is a pet hate of mine so i'm especially aware of these things. room was your typical parquet, modern decor a là radisson but i prefer this to dated 'personalised' hotel furnishings. breakfast wasn't bad, younger crowd than the royal radisson in helsinki but perhaps it was just the time of year. excellent location but if i wasn't trying to clock up points on my hotel card i probably would have looked elsewhere. stay wasn't bad just average.
reviews.title: Good location but no charm

reviews.text: On arrival, found sticky dirt on the floor just in front of the minibar. OK, they wiped it away after I called the reception.
reviews.title: some problems

reviews.text: Next day, obviously no service person came into the room during the whole day, neither to take away the garbage, nor to bring new towels, nor to arrange the bed. OK, they apologized, brought some small chocolates box to the room the day after. But on departure, they did not print out the invoice the way I wanted (and needed, for getting the money back from my company) it. Again a lot of trouble ...I can´t remember any stay in a hotel during a business trip that caused such a lot of problems!
reviews.title: not a great hotel

reviews.text: Stayed for 4 nights at the end of June, 2005. Overall, experience was average and I wouldn't return except it's on my company's preferred list. Still under going construction with very little separation to operating section. The room was "business class" but since I was on corporate rate they removed wi-fi access and robes ... pretty petty. The maid service was less than average with dust everywhere, but it got better. I was wondering if the room was vacant for a while before my stay. Breakfast was OK.
reviews.title: Expensive for what it offers, but in a good location

description: Commercial Hotel on banks of Oulu River in center of town, less than 1 km from bus terminal, train station, air terminal or harbor
